lines.text: There's an outside chance that statue was supposed to be part of the ritual, I guess.
Like, you set up your circle on an altar in front of the statue of the demon god you want to contact, y'know?
I don't know, no, but keep talkin'.
Yeah, well... problem is, this statue doesn't look like any demonic deity I'm familiar with.
Plus, the table's all the way over there.
I guess it could've been moved, but we'd need to know why.
...Let's put a pin in that one for now.
We oughta be thinkin' about how it <c=#FF00FF>got there in the first place.</c>
